snippet: An uproar ensued over an image of a professor at an evangelical Christian school and a caption that said that Christians and Muslims worship the same deity.
abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column examines controversial statement made by Wheaton College Prof Larycia Hawkins, in which she claimed solidarity with Muslims as they worship same God she worships as Christian, which led to her leaving her position at college; notes idea that monotheistic traditions of Judaism, Christianity and Islam share same God has support from people in all three traditions.
lead_paragraph: An uproar ensued over an image of a professor at an evangelical Christian school and a caption that said that Christians and Muslims worship the same deity.

headline.print_headline: In Uproar Over Facebook Post, Familiar Debate on Monotheism
headline.main: Facebook Post Revives Debate on Whether Monotheists Worship Same God
